pages.text: The Ritual of Demonic Summoning will summon lesser demons from the Demon Realm. As this direction of travel is far easier to do for non-banished entites, this ritual can be crafted without materials from the demon realm.
Summoning demons with this ritual allows you to obtain seared flesh, which you can use for further crafting.
Searing flesh is dropped by most lesser demons from the demon realm. This includes those that can be summoned with a ritual of demonic summoning.
